amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 12, as amendment No. 70, that restricts the use of funds for new energy efficiency standards under the Codes and Standards Program.

action.text: Mr. Walker raised a point of order against the Olver amendment (A031). Mr. Walker stated that the amendment was being offered at the incorrect time, and should be offered at the end of consideration of title 3. The Chair sustained the point of order.
